item.description:
Want to turn over a new leaf? Join dietitian Jessica Jones-Hughes in a conversation about finding physical and mental well-being in the garden this Fall.

This workshop is part of our Seed, Sow & Grow 2012 program series. All Seed Sow & Grow programs are free and open to public. However, registration is required for all the workshops. Call 617-542-7696 or email: info@bostonnatural.org to register.

For more information about BNAN's full series of Seed Sow & Grow 2012 program, click here.
item.how_to_find_us: City Natives is a short walk from the Mattapan Square MBTA Station (Red Line) and Blue Hill Avenue bus lines. Parking is available along Edgewater Drive
item.name: Finding Health in the Garden
